features.metadata_extraction: Fetches title, description, and tags from RedGifs API
features.embed_conversion: Converts watch URLs to embed format for display
features.tag_integration: Auto-detected tags are added to the video
features.preview: Shows embed preview in upload form

api_endpoints: /api/redgifs/metadata - Fetch metadata for a RedGifs URL

service_features.authentication: Automatic token management with RedGifs API
service_features.url_validation: Validates and extracts IDs from RedGifs URLs
service_features.embed_generation: Creates proper embed URLs for display
